page.title: 16Adult Leisure in Uxbridge
page.content: There is a night-club in Uxbridge High Street called Regals which caters for those over the age of 21.There are also many pubs, a wine bar and a selection of restaurants.A snooker hall can be found in our High st and evening courses in many subjects are held throughout the area.During the summer months, canal boat discos are organised from the Swan and Bottle car-park to Harefield.The canal also offers the chance to fish.Uxbridge has a ski slope,an out-door swimming pool,an athletics track,cricket and tennis club,a squash club and a health club.There is a golf course at Hillingdon(9 hole) and an 18 hole municipal course.
